-- | Yet Another Brainfuck Interpreter
--   
@package yabi-muno
@version 0.1.0.1

module Yabi.Types
newtype VM a
VM :: StateT World IO a -> VM a
runVM :: VM a -> StateT World IO a
data Inst
Next :: Inst
Prev :: Inst
Incr :: Inst
Decr :: Inst
PutC :: Inst
GetC :: Inst
Loop :: [Inst] -> Inst
data World
World :: IntMap Word8 -> Int -> World
_array :: World -> IntMap Word8
_pos :: World -> Int
array :: Lens' World (IntMap Word8)
pos :: Lens' World Int
instance Functor VM
instance Applicative VM
instance Monad VM
instance MonadState World VM
instance MonadIO VM

module Yabi.Engine
run :: [Inst] -> VM ()
initWorld :: World

module Yabi.Parser
programParser :: Parsec String () [Inst]

module Yabi
